meanings.definition: A point or place that is equally distant from all sides or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The playground has a swing set in the centers.
meanings.sent2: The target is at the centers of the shooting range.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a surprise in the centers - a hidden toy!
meanings.sent4: Her smile always centers the room, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The compass needle always points towards the centers of the Earth.

meanings.definition: The middle point of a circle or sphere.
meanings.sent1: The bullseye is right at the centers of the dartboard.
meanings.sent2: The Earth's core is at the centers of the planet.
meanings.sent3: The cat loves to nap curled up in the centers of the rug.
meanings.sent4: His voice resonated from the centers of the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The gemstone sparkled from the centers of the necklace.

meanings.definition: A place where a particular activity or function is carried out.
meanings.sent1: The hospital has a trauma centers for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: The library has a study centers for students.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen is the centers of delicious smells in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her art studio is the centers of creativity in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The gym is the centers of fitness for the community.
